content.en: Stock market forecasting: Researchers have been exploring the use of artificial neural networks and deep learning algorithms to predict stock market trends and improve forecasting accuracy. These algorithms, such as the Deep Neural Network (DNN) method and the Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) model, are being used to develop comprehensive deep learning systems and hybrid models that can accurately predict short-term stock market price trends. Additionally, sentiment analysis of financial news articles coupled with machine learning techniques is being used to improve stock price prediction accuracy.
content.da: Børsprognoser: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af artificielle neurale netværk og dybdelæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige aktiemarkeds tendenser og forbedre prognosenøjagtighed. Disse algoritmer, såsom Deep Neural Network (DNN) metoden og Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) modellen, bliver brugt til at udvikle omfattende dybdelæringssystemer og hybridmodeller, der præcist kan forudsige kortsigtede aktiemarkedspristrends. Derudover bruges sentimentanalyse af finansielle nyhedsartikler i kombination med maskinlæringsteknikker til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af aktieprisprediktioner.
